data.text:

What is life and what is death? Is there such things as rebirth and immortality or are they man-made concepts? And how can one actually be enlightened?

The Holy Mountain is surreal fantasy drama following a Christlike figure, known as the thief, as he come across an alchemist who hooks him with seven others on a journey of transformation and a quest to find the secret of immortality.
